input_query:
You plan to visit 4 European cities for 17 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You would like to visit Copenhagen for 7 days. You plan to stay in Nice for 7 days. You have to attend a workshop in Nice between day 7 and day 13. You plan to stay in Barcelona for 3 days. You would like to meet your friends at Barcelona between day 13 and day 15 to tour together. You would like to visit Santorini for 3 days.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Copenhagen and Barcelona, Copenhagen and Santorini, Nice and Barcelona, Copenhagen and Nice, Barcelona and Santorini.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 17 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
